1.0.0.name: wordpress/hyphoo
1.0.0.description:
Hypho-o is a plugin (provided by plazoo) that automatically hyphenates your articles, pages and comments. Hyphenation in a simple and comfortable way which fits every layout and theme. Change your layout and your text will follow;)

Hypho-o inserts an so called softhyphen (displayed as “­” in the source) at all possible hyphenation points of a word. The browser displays this softhyphen as a hyphen when needed.

Hyphoo Features:

  • Simple Hyphenation for articles, pages and comments
  • Hyphenation may be used separately for the main text or for text extracts
  • Supported languages: German, English, Czech, French, Dutch and Russian
  • Custom Configuration interface for changing the default settings
  • Administration Interface in: German, Englisch, Dutch and Russian
  • No JavaScript needed
